channel.title: Jamf Pro on AppleShare IT
channel.description: Recent content in Jamf Pro on AppleShare IT

item.title: CIS-Script
item.description: This CIS Script is build to report and remediate based on the your organisation score. While working with CIS Benchmarks (Remediation Scripts and/or Configuration Profiles) I felt this could be done better, faster and easier. The guys from the macOS Security Compliance Project did an amazing job automating the guidance and configuration profiles. I created custom rules set for CIS Benchmark to integrate with the macOS Security Compliance Project and published CIS-macOS-Security.

item.title: onAirScanner
item.description: While working from home, we all have a lot of meetings, and sometimes a family member or a roommate has no idea that you are in a meeting and they walk into the room without even a knock. Setting up a light to show when you are “ON AIR” or in a meeting is a great solution. There are several solutions out on the internet that can do this.
